name: Lamp Head
description: The protagonist of this game is a strange man with a lamp instead his head who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 180 MB available space
